description: The list of access methods that can be used to fetch the DrsObject. Required for single blobs and bundles have no access method.

type.description: Type of the access method e.g https,ftp,gs etc.

access_id.description: An arbitrary string to be passed to the /access method to get an AccessURL. This string must be unique within the scope of a single object. Note that at least one of access_url and access_id must be provided.
